  • Constructor Details

    • Race

      public Race​(java.lang.String roadImage, java.lang.String roadMask, java.lang.String roadPosition, int roadWidth, int roadHeight)
      Stores the race position and angle.
      Parameters:
      roadImage - The image of the road.
      roadMask - The mask of the road, used for collision.
      roadPosition - The mask of the road used for measuring the progress of a racer.
      roadWidth - The width of the image.
      roadHeight - The height of the image.
